### PR Title Format

Use: `<type>: <short description>`

Examples:
- News: add event article
- Homepage: fix typo
- Theme: fix size on mobile
- Hugo: update version to 0.152

---

This template provides guidance on creating a PR that can be reviewed and approved as quickly as possible. Comments may be safely deleted.

## PR Checklist

- [ ] [Maintainer edits for this PR](https://help.github.com/en/github/collaborating-with-issues-and-pull-requests/allowing-changes-to-a-pull-request-branch-created-from-a-fork) is enabled.
- [ ] The code is verified to work as described.
- [ ] This change adds/updates translations.
- [ ] This change adds resources that have a permissive license.
